battle_ticket.name: Battle Ticket
battle_ticket.description: Replenishes 1 battle stock. Consumed after use.

challenge_ticket.name: Challenge Ticket
challenge_ticket.description: Replenishes 1 challenge stock. Consumed after use.

battle_potion.name: Battle Potion
battle_potion.description: Increases chance of victory for the next battle. Scales depending on level difference from +1 for Grumbos who are 20 levels higher than you to +5 if the same level or lower. Can have multiple active at the same time but only 1 will be used up every battle. Unaffected by level difference modifiers. Against bosses, deal an extra 3 damage. Consumed after use.

antidote.name: Antidote
antidote.description: Removes the 'Poison' active. Consumed after use.

fools_gold.name: Fools Gold
fools_gold.description: Only 1 time, if you were to lose gold in battle (not challenge), the Fools Gold will be lost instead. Can only have one active at a time. Consumed after use.

grumbo_ticket.name: Grumbo Ticket
grumbo_ticket.description: Completely replenishes all battle and challenge stocks.

charm_of_wumbo.name: Charm of Wumbo
charm_of_wumbo.description: If you're battle chance is below 20% after all modifiers, bring victory chance up to 20%. Doesn't work against bosses. Consumed after use.

duel_converter.name: Duel Converter
duel_converter.description: Converts a battle stock into a challenge stock.

gamblers_coin.name: Gambler's Coin
gamblers_coin.description: Can only use 1 at a time. Gain 80 exp... or maybe lose 80 exp... or maybe...

flimsy_rope.name: Flimsy Rope
flimsy_rope.description: Has a 50% chance of avoiding any post battle Grumbo active effects (good or bad). Gets used up even if an effect wasn't avoided.

berserk_potion.name: Berserk Potion
berserk_potion.description: Increases victory chance by 5%. Every battle, the victory chance increased goes down by 1%, all the way down to -5% in the last battle. The same chance modifier is also applied to extra (or loss) damage done against bosses. Can only have 1 active at a time.

poison_charm.name: Poison Charm
poison_charm.description: Prevents poison. Poison that is already active will remain active. Use to activate indefinitely. Use again to deactivate.

bandages.name: Bandages
bandages.description: Removes the 'Bleed' active. Consumed after use.

master_grumbos_blessing.name: Master Grumbo's Blessing
master_grumbos_blessing.description: Use it to receive Master Grumbo's Blessing. It's random. But it's good.

feather_stone.name: Feather Stone
feather_stone.description: Removes the 'Petrify' active. Consumed after use.

grumbot_miner.name: Grumbot Miner
grumbot_miner.description: Grumbot mines for 10 battles, retrieving 90-150 gold after each battle.

throwing_shield.name: Throwing Shield
throwing_shield.description: Throw a shield at an enemy in battle. Increases chance of victory by DEF/3. Against bosses, deals an extra 6 damage.

mini_magnet.name: Mini Magnet
mini_magnet.description: Gain 20 gold after every battle/phase regardless of outcome. Use to activate indefinitely. Use again to deactivate.

blood_potion.name: Blood Potion
blood_potion.description: For 2 battles, increases chance of victory by 5-10%

iron_pendant.name: Iron Pendant
iron_pendant.description: Prevents petrify and bleed. Petrify or Bleed that is already active will remain active. Use to activate indefinitely. Use again to deactivate.
